scripts.clean: taskkill /F /IM cargo.exe /T 2>nul & taskkill /F /IM drawing-app-backend.exe /T 2>nul & echo Processes cleaned
scripts.clean-force: taskkill /F /IM cargo.exe /T 2>nul & taskkill /F /IM drawing-app-backend.exe /T 2>nul & taskkill /F /IM rustc.exe /T 2>nul & echo All Rust processes forcefully terminated
